oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-01-12 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Jerry Rivers (performer), on January 12, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Nobody's Lonesome For Me (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Twin Guitar Polka (Sammy and Don guitar) -- Louis Buck talks -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- Gathering Flowers For The Master's Bouquet (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Eighth Of January (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.);
